content: Why is homeomorphism a structure and not a class? Supposed I defined a diffeomorphism, how do I build out of it an instance of homeomorphism or somehow transform it into a homeomorphism?
you define a function from diffeo to homeo and make it a coe
It is not a class because we want to work with different homeomorphisms between the same pair of types.

Mario Carneiro said:
